RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH: Possui Mestrado (ciclo unico 5 anos) em Cincias Biolgicas pela Universidade de Roma Tre (2004), depois um doutorado em Biologia - Universit degli Studi Roma Tre (2009). Atualmente bolseira de pos doutoramento da Universidade de Aveiro. Tem experincia na rea de Zoologia, com nfase em gentica e biologia da conservao, e da Ecologia das populaes animais.
RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH-EN: Master degree in Biological Sciences at the University of "Roma Tre" (five years course) in 2004. Ph.D. in Biology at the Univesrity of Roma Tre (2009). Actually is employed as a post-doc fellow at the University of Aveiro. Has experience in Zoology, focusing on genetics and conservation biology, as in Ecology of animal populations.

OUTRAS-INFORMACOES-RELEVANTES.OUTRAS-INFORMACOES-RELEVANTES: Attendance to 28 national and International conferences (details available at www.cesam.ua.pt/stefaniachiesa) Author of 25 original DNA sequences deposited in GenBank. Member of the SETAC Europe, the EAS (European Aquaculture Society), the AIIAD (Association of Freshwater Italian Ichthyologists) and the Italian Barcoding network. Field expert for the scientific sectors BIO07 (Ecology) since 2008. Referee activity: PlosOne, Conservation Genetics, Marine Biology Research, Molecular Biology Reports, Environmental Science and Pollution Research, Ecotoxicology and Environmental Safety, Comparative Biochemistry and Physiology, Estuarine Coastal and Shelf Science. Associate Editor activity: Frontiers in Environmental Science. National Italian Qualification to the profession of Biologist obtained by the University of Parma on July, 13rd, 2011. -Project Partecipation: 2014: ICNF (Institute for the Conservation of Nature and Forest- Portugal). Project title: Estado atual da ostra portuguesa (Crassostrea angulata) no esturio do Sado, ameaas e oportunidades para a sua explorao como recurso . 2009-2014 Life Nature SCI (Species of Community Interest) Water +07/NAT/IT/433 Improvement of conservation status of Community Interest Species from Appennine area of Prato . 2009 European Social Fund Project 101006 Analysis and evaluation of new tools for tracking and tracing of environmental and seafood safety, to obtain the release of European food certifications (DOP-IGP) -Attendance to Professional courses and Schools (last five years): 2011. I UZI Spring School (Italian Union of Zoology) How to measure and preserve biodiversity , at Istituto Veneto di Scienze Lettere ed Arti , May 20-22nd Venice.
